query: 如图,在▱ABCD中,EF过对角线交点O,交AD于E,交BC于F,若AB=4,BC=5,OE=1.5,那么,四边形EFCD的周长为()选项：['16', '14', '12', '10']
answer: 】解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴OA=OC,AD∥BC,AD=BC=5,CD=AB=4,∴∠EAO=∠FCO,在△AOE和△COF中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠EAO=∠FCO\\OA=OC\\∠AOE=∠COF\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△AOE≌△COF(ASA),∴OE=OF=1.5,AE=CF,∴四边形EFCD的周长为:EF+FC+CD+DE=EF+AE+ED+CD=EF+AD+CD=3+4+5=12．故选:C．
